html.p: Two steps are required to ingest Enterprise Response data in Splunk

ul.li: Determine preferred method of deployment. Ex - Install Splunk UF on CB Master. Send event data direct to indexers.
Deploy Carbon Black Enterprise Response TA Splunkbase.splunk.com.
Broadcast events to the CBER message bus utilizing the Carbon Black cb-event-forwarder
Step by step video guide is provided here.
